section.heading: Regional cooperation.
section.text: This subchapter encourages the Council to work with its Maryland and Virginia counterparts to develop a regional information sharing system that allows one-stops and welfare agencies in the District and surrounding jurisdictions to access information regarding regional employment opportunities, job training providers, and support services.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction by substituting “Council” for “Board”.
